ygData.subject: Re: Meanstreaks
ygData.msgSnippet: Sorry I went kinda idle. I was updating the site. ... Astral looks Motormaster over, wondering why the bot was acting strangely. Well, we re kinda fighting

Sorry I went kinda idle. I was updating the site.

::Astral/Recklessa::

Astral looks Motormaster over, wondering why the bot was acting 
strangely.

"Well, we're kinda fighting off a battle. Or were, at least." He 
says, motioning to indicate the destroyed landscape around them. "If 
you wait a little while, our troops will get repaired and we might be 
able to help you."
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Recklessa lands behind Astral, looking Motormaster over.



--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, Robert Dahl <rdahl@s...> wrote:
> Motormaster lands, looking at the two bots he dosent know. He 
looked as if
> he was triying to restrain something. "My name is Motormaster" He 
stammers.
> My crew and I were shot down by enemy ships and we are stranded 
here. Could
> you provide us with some help?" He finishes with a look of discust 
on his
> face. How long can I keep this whiny attitude up, He thinks to 
himself.
